name: Radar (Vitalii Zavoloka)
description:
You are an operator of an Air Defence unit.

Your trusty radar sends a signal every ten seconds.

The signal reveals enemy missiles that fly towards civilian targets you are protecting

Your job is to predict the path of an enemy missile and shoot it down.

Controls:

Click on the spot on the radar in the direction you want your missile to fly.

Your missiles always fly from the center of the radar screen.

Please pay attention, there is a cooldown between every launch of ally missile.

Devs:

Vitalii Zavoloka, Mykhailo Novoseltsev

Sound assets:

https://opengameart.org/content/ambient-spaceship-hums by dklon  

https://opengameart.org/content/gui-sound-effects-5 by jalastram
